job_description:
Top building material company is currently seeking an Outside Sales Representative to cover one of their growing territories. They are a distributor of multiple products including acoustical ceilings, drywall, and insulation. This position is responsible for establishing new business and maintaining customer relationships with contractors, builders, remodelers and other professionals in the industry. Company prefers a candidate with knowledge in the building materials industry.

The right candidate for this position is required to have at least 2 years of experience in outside sales. Direct product experience is not required but preferred. The candidate will be responsible for building relationships with a customer base that buys from them on a consistent basis.

Territory Includes - all of Maine

Other Requirements:
• Exceptional verbal and written communication skills
• Extremely Self-Motivated
• Excellent Time Management Skills
• Ability to train
• A hunter with a track record of prospecting for new business

Qualifications: Company prefers a candidate with knowledge in the building materials industry
